original_text: And the great court round about was with three rows of hewed stones, and a row of cedar beams, both for the inner court of the house of the Lord, and for the porch of the house.
korean_text: 또 큰 뜰 주위에는 다듬은 돌 세 켜와 백향목 두꺼운 판자 한 켜를 놓았으니 마치 여호와의 성전 안뜰과 주랑에 놓은 것 같더라

sentences.original_text: And the great court round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 큰 마당은 주위를 두르고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: was with three rows of hewed stones
and a row of cedar beams
sentences.korean_translation: 한 줄의 백향목 들보로 되어 있었다

sentences.original_text: both for the inner court of house of the Lord
and for the porch of the house
